settings.title: JADE
settings.text: The best sparkling wines on the internet.

settings.heading: Email us
settings.subheading: Send us an email through the form. We usually respond within one business day.

settings.title: BRUT GOLD LABEL
settings.text: This is our signature bottle with tasty notes of locally sourced grapes, and sustainably produced and bottled.

settings.title: No Sugar Added
settings.subheading: Without the sugar, there's no hangover. We keep all the infused natural sweetness with every sip. It's just the good stuff.

settings.title: Vegan Friendly
settings.subheading: What's in the bottle only comes from mother earth, and no-where else.

settings.title: Nothing Artificial
settings.subheading: No additives, just as it's intended.

settings.quote: This is literally the best sparkling wine I’ve ever tasted. Ideal for day-drinking and waking up in the morning not feeling like garbage.

settings.title: A Wine Experience Like Never Before
